text: Shaun Peter Murphy (born 10 August 1982) is an English professional snooker player. He won the 2005 World Championship. He is nicknamed "The Magician". Shaun Murphy is known for his straight cue action and his long potting. He was born in Harlow, England, UK. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Essex Category:English snooker players
title: Shaun Murphy
